node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `achievement` ( `achievement_id` int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `code` mediumtext, `display` mediumtext, `achievement_type` char(50) DEFAULT NULL, `achievement_still_available` tinyint NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `subtype` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`achievement_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci
node.title: achievement
